item.title: New NFT Art- April 2025.
item.description: This art symbolizes the rich wisdoms of Mavlana Jalal El-din Al-Rumi in a Mystic Sufi Poem as the following: A New Rule It is the rule with drunkards to fall upon each other, to quarrel, become violent, and make a scene. The lover is even worse than a drunkard. I will tell you what love is: to enter a mine of gold. And what is that gold? The lover is a king above all kings,

item.title: Latest Months artwork by nemah;
item.description: Hello to all my new followers of my blog, in this post I will share with you the latest paintings I have been working on for the last couple of months; their theme and story behind them. Enjoy! The first one is a circular canvas that represents a clock; I have added mechanical clock pieces on the canvas to make it a wall clock. The second and third ones represents the historical town of Jableh in Syria with pronounced elements of the city such as Roman theater and Sufi Mosque arches with white Greek dome architecture style.

item.title: Welcome to N Design Studyosu;
item.description: At NDesignStudio & Affiliate Partners, we work with you to optimize your business from the top down. As an award-winning design Studio, our group of professional engineers and social media content planners are always here to help your business get off the ground and grow.
